Anpe Calais Theatre is a theatre located in Calais, France. It is a public theatre that hosts a variety of performances, including plays, musicals, and dance performances. The theatre has a seating capacity of 1,000 seats and is equipped with state-of-the-art technology, including a digital sound system and a large screen. The theatre also has a caf√© and a bar, where visitors can relax and enjoy a drink or snack before or after a performance.

The theatre is located in the heart of Calais, making it easily accessible by car or public transportation. The address is 37, rue Gustave Cuvelier, B.P. 349, 62107 Calais CEDEX.

Anpe Calais Theatre is a member of the Association of French Theatres (ANPE), which represents the interests of theatres across France. The theatre is also a member of the European Theatre Association (ETA), which promotes the development of theatre in Europe.

The theatre has a strong commitment to accessibility and inclusivity, with features such as wheelchair accessibility, audio descriptions, and sign language interpretation. The theatre also offers a range of accessibility services
